abstract.p: Isle of Dogs offers new line of dog-grooming products; photos (Pulse column) (S)

block.p: A new holistic canine grooming line from Isle of Dogs raises dog-washing to a whole different level, with natural, show-kennel-worthy ingredients tailored for different breeds and types of dogs. The 16 shampoos, detangling conditioners, grooming sprays and food supplements may be had for $18 to $51 via (888) 687-4872 or through www.iodogs.com, where you can also enter your dog's personal profile. Designed to reduce shedding, soothe irritated skin, enhance coat texture and hue, the pooch-specific products will turn even the most motley Heinz 57-variety mutt into a glamour-puss.
